description.value:
Like the great dragons, you can take to the skies and terrorize opponents from above. As a swift action, you can manifest leathery dragon wings that grant you a fly speed of 60 feet (clumsy maneuverability).

At 10th level, your maneuverability increases to poor. You can use these wings for 1 minute per day for each oracle level you have. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments.

At 11th level you can use these wings for 10 minutes per day for each oracle level you have.

At 15th level, you can use the wings indefinitely.

You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.
